elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may pay {1}. If you do: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.  When you create a token — []I gain 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Spell you play this turn costs {1} less.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][][Scout] {1}.  {H} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.  When you play a Spell — If I have 1 or more boosts: I gain 2 boosts.
{H} []You may send to Reserve target Character with Hand Cost {2} or less.  {R} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Spell you play this turn loses [[Fleeting]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} You may discard a Spell from your Reserve. If you do: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][][Scout] {1}.  {J} You may discard a Spell from your Reserve. If you do: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.

{J} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.  {H} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Create a [Mana Moth 2/2/2] Illusion token in your Companion Expedition.
{R} []Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.  When I leave the Expedition zone — If you control one or more Landmarks: Target Character in play or in Reserve gains 2 boosts.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next card you play this turn costs {1} less.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: The next Spell you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.  {R} You may pay {1}. If you do: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.
{J} You may pay {1}. If you do: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Spell you play this turn loses [[Fleeting]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][][Scout] {1}.  {J} You may discard a Spell from your Reserve. If you do: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.  When you create a token — If my Expedition is behind: Target Character gains 1 boost.
{J} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If it's a Spell: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.  {H} If your Hero Expedition is behind: Draw a card.
{R} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may exhaust target card in Reserve.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If you control one or more Landmarks: You may send to Reserve target Character with Hand Cost {4} or more.  {R} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.

{H} If your Hero Expedition is behind: You may send to Reserve target Character with Hand Cost {4} or more.  {R} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.

{H} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.  When I leave the Expedition zone — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Create a [Mana Moth 2/2/2] Illusion token in your Hero Expedition.
[][][Scout] {1}.  {J} []Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.  When you create a token — If I have 1 or more boosts: Target Character in play or in Reserve gains 2 boosts.

{J} If both of your Expeditions are behind or tied: Target Character in play or in Reserve other than me gains 1 boost.  {R} You may pay {1}. If you do: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.
{J} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Remove up to 2 counters from target card in play or in Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Spell you play this turn loses [[Fleeting]].
